text: To defeat the enemy, you must become the enemy.
author: Sun Tzu

text: God is not on the side of the big battalions, but on the side of the best shots.
author: Voltaire

text: A prince must be a fox to know the traps and a lion to frighten the wolves.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli

text: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
author: Sun Tzu

text: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli

text: History is a set of lies agreed upon.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

text: An army marches on its stomach.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

text: There is no place for the weak in this world.
author: Otto von Bismarck
